name: Neon Snake (itch) (JRevel)
description:
A game made in 8 days for the Juice Jam ! 

Collect orbs to grow your snake and reach the end of the level !

Controls : 

- The snakes follows your mouse cursor

- Left click to dash.

- Keep right click pressed to go under water.

- When under water, the dash makes you jump.

Made by Julien Revel

External assets used : font Akashi

Music and SFX made using FL Studio
